participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic about sports and movies.
participant_1.background: I love hockey. I prefer texting over phone calls. My mother looks after my grandmother. I sleep 8 hours. I use the computer all day.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and social, enjoys deep conversations and has a passion for reading.
participant_2.background: My parents live across the street from me. I am in grad school. I work in a coffee shop. I love to read true crime books. My favorite drink is caramel cappuccino.

content.text: I love hockey. Do you like sports?
I used to play soccer in high school, but I'm not really into sports anymore.
That's too bad. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read true crime books. I find them really interesting.
I've never read a true crime book before. What's your favorite one?
My favorite one is "In Cold Blood" by Truman Capote. It's about the murder of a family in Kansas in the 1950s.
That sounds really interesting. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
What do you like to do at the movies?
I like to watch action movies, comedies, and horror movies.
Me too! I love action movies.
What's your favorite action movie?
My favorite action movie is "Die Hard". It's so iconic.
I love "Die Hard"! It's one of my favorites too.
It's so good.
It is.
I'm glad we have the same taste in movies.
Me too! It's always fun to find someone who likes the same things you do.
